name: Diplomatic Overture
description: A neighboring kingdom reaches out to establish or improve diplomatic relations.
location: Choose or roll for a neighboring kingdom
special: - If you have Civic & Governance structures, gain an untyped bonus equal to the tier to the check - Cannot establish Helpful relations without appropriate diplomatic capacity (see Diplomatic Relations rules) - If relations are already Helpful, critical success grants 2 Gold instead

modifierTemplate.name: Diplomatic Tension
modifierTemplate.description: The failed diplomatic overture has strained relations with neighboring kingdoms

onResolution.successMsg: The diplomatic tension situation has been resolved!
onResolution.failureMsg: Failed to resolve the diplomatic tension situation

criticalSuccess.msg: Relations improve by one step; if now Helpful, +1 Gold and -1 Unrest

success.msg: Relations improve by one step (max Friendly without diplomatic structures)

failure.msg: No change in relations; minor diplomatic friction

criticalFailure.msg: Relations worsen by one step; +1 Unrest
